overview: In the image, the clock's repeated ticking runs through the whole film. The author traces his personal experience in watching early surreal short films and feeds back the basic concept of the work. Many images such as clock dials, metal needles, mobile phone interfaces, eyeballs, and eye symbols are present. The phrase "future is a repetition of waiting time" repeats in the work in an obscure way; it is the author's question about the future and an answer to this way of "asking questions."
title: The Needle of Time
